name: OKHSL
description: OKHSL color space by Bj√∂rn Ottosson - a perceptually uniform HSL based on OKLab. H is hue (0-360), S is saturation (0-1, normalized to sRGB gamut), L is lightness (0-1). Reference: https://bottosson.github.io/posts/colorpicker/

h.description: Hue angle (0-360 degrees), same as OKLCH hue

s.description: Saturation (0-1), normalized relative to sRGB gamut boundary

l.description: Lightness (0-1), perceptually uniform with toe function applied

initializers.title: OKHSL Color Initializer
initializers.description: Creates an OKHSL color from H, S, L values

conversions.description: Converts OKLab to OKHSL using Ottosson's algorithm with Halley's method refinement for gamut boundary
